pkgmetadata.longdescription: The GHC API is a great tool for working with Haskell code. Unfortunately, it's also fairly opaque and hard to get started with. This library abstracts away the intricacies of working with the GHC API, giving a general, no-nonsense way to extract highly optimized (or not, depending on your use case) Core, STG, custom intermediate code, and other information from Haskell code.
